title: Manage Fan Loyalty Program Rewards
description: A fan wants to redeem their loyalty points for a signed jersey.

tasks.description: Identify the fan and check their current loyalty point balance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the fan has enough points for the jersey.

tasks.description: Check the inventory of available signed jerseys.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms there are jerseys in stock.

tasks.description: Process the redemption, deducting the points from the fan's account and creating a shipping order for the jersey.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully completes the redemption and schedules the jersey for shipment.
